ipxact:component.ipxact:name: i2c
ipxact:component.ipxact:description: I2C master controller - with enhanced register descriptions

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: STOP_bit
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Issue a STOP condition after transmitting this data byte

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: START_bit
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Issue a START condition before transmitting this data byte

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: transmitDone
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates that the current transmission is complete. Write a 1 to clear this bit.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: arbitrationFailure
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates an arbitration failure. Wite a 1 to clear this bit.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: noAcknowledge
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates that no acknowledge was recieved on the current transmission. This bit is reset when a new transmission starts.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: active
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates that I2C bus is active

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: scl
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates the current state of the scl line

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: sda
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates the current state of the sda line

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: receiveFifoFull
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates that the receive FIFO is full

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: receiveFifoEmpty
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates that the receive FIFO is empty

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: trasmitFifoFull
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates that the trasmit FIFO is full

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: trasmitFifoEmpty
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates that the trasmit FIFO is empty

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: Module_ID
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Contains the ID number of the IP
